'Assumption Grammar School' (known as 'The Assumption', 'Assumption Grammar' or
'AGS') is a voluntary Catholic girls' grammar school in Ballynahinch, County
Down, Northern Ireland with approximately 900 students on roll aged 11â18. It
was founded by the Missionary Sisters of the Assumption in 1933 and was approved
by the Ministry of Education in 1936. Admission to the school is by examination
and entrance to Year 13 or Lower Sixth is based on GCSE grades.
